name: 霍弘毅
objective: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
schedule:
Autumn 2008
Research Methods: Graduate
Syllabus

In this course students are instructed in the creation of, research of, and organization of an MLA style research Paper.  Our texts are The Brief Holt Guide and The MLA Guide.
The student will be graded in steps leading up to the writing of an MLA correct 10-12 pages research paper.

Unit 1: Getting Started: the Nature and Purpose of the Research Paper
Unit 2: Beginning Research
Unit 3: Note taking, citation and sources
Unit 4: Integrating sources into your prose
Unit 5: Staying organized: the Outline
Unit 6: Paragraph organization; sentence variety; documentation
Unit 7: The Introductory and Concluding paragraphs
Unit 8: Review
